level.heading: REMOVAL OF ANTENNAS, ANTENNA TOWERS MONOPOLES AND RELATED EQUIPMENT (ยง 11-2716)

level.text: Antennas, antenna towers, monopoles, equipment cabinets, or equipment shelters shall be removed at the expense of the property owner if they have not been used for a period of one year. A one-year extension may be granted by the Board of Zoning Adjustment to this requirement for good cause shown.
